trans-unit.source: Indicates how side-by-side assemblies are configured for <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica la modalità side-by-side assembly sono configurati per <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SxsOption is used for the value of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>.
trans-unit.target: SxsOption viene utilizzato per il valore del <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Side-by-side assemblies are not used within the enclosed context.
trans-unit.target: Gli assembly side-by-side non vengono utilizzati all'interno del contesto tra parentesi.

trans-unit.source: Ignore is the default setting for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption*> when <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance*> is set to <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ignorare l'impostazione predefinita è <> </> *> quando <> </> *> è impostato su <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current side-by-side assembly of the enclosed context is used.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato l'assembly side-by-side corrente del contesto racchiuso.

trans-unit.source: Inherit is the default setting for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption*> when <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance*> is set to <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: Ereditare è l'impostazione predefinita per <> </> *> quando <> </> *> è impostata su <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Inherit>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption.Inherit>

trans-unit.source: A new side-by-side assembly is created for the enclosed context.
trans-unit.target: Per il contesto tra parentesi, viene creato un nuovo assembly side-by-side.
